parameters.name: UnloadedComponentPathNames
parameters.description: Array of children components' path names

parameters.name: UnloadedComponentReferencedConfigurationNames
parameters.description: Array of children components' referenced configuration names

parameters.name: ReasonForUnloadingComponents
parameters.description: Array indicating the reason each child component is unloaded as defined by swComponentLoadStatus_e

parameters.name: DocTypes
parameters.description: Array of document types as defined in swDocumentTypes_e

title: IComponent2.GetUnloadedComponentNames
description: Gets the component's unloaded children components' path names, referenced configuration names, reasons why they are unloaded, document types, and names.
signature:
System.Object GetUnloadedComponentNames( 
   out System.Object
UnloadedComponentPathNames
,
   out System.Object
UnloadedComponentReferencedConfigurationNames
,
   out System.Object
ReasonForUnloadingComponents
,
   out System.Object
DocTypes
)

parameters.name: UnloadedComponentPathNames
parameters.description: Array of children components' path names

parameters.name: UnloadedComponentReferencedConfigurationNames
parameters.description: Array of children components' referenced configuration names

parameters.name: ReasonForUnloadingComponents
parameters.description: Array indicating the reason each child component is unloaded as defined by swComponentLoadStatus_e

parameters.name: DocTypes
parameters.description: Array of document types as defined in swDocumentTypes_e

remarks:
This method is useful when the assembly document was opened with
Quick View/Selective open
.
To get whether a component has hidden or suppressed children components, call
IComponent2::HasUnloadedComponents
.
